DOC.brief_summary: Diabetic men and controls are examined for retrograde ejaculation, and erectile dysfunction is registered with a validated questionaire (International Index of Erectile Function-15). Concentration, total number of sperm and motility is determined in freshly delivered ejaculates and postejaculatory urine. Our hypothetis is that diabetics exhibit significantly higher rate of retrograde ejaculation than healthy controls.
DOC.brief_title: Retrograde Ejaculation and Sexual Dysfunction in Men With Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Men 3055 years of age Men registered in a Diabetic Biobank including 6000 diabetics and 6000 controls Men who do not understand Danish
